headline: Show HN: World’s first £3 flat fee (0% FX markup) money transfer service
description: Good morning everyone! My co-founder and I recently moved to the UK after working at Robinhood for over 5 years. We were stunned at the fees it was costing us to move money across borders with existing fintech solutions, so we decided to start Atlantic Money - the world’s first fixed fee (with no FX markup) money transfer product. For £3 you can transfer up to £1M. Let us know if you have any questions!
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: 世界上第一个3英镑统一费用（0%外汇加价）的汇款服务
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: 世界上第一個3英鎊統一費用（0%外匯加價）的匯款服務
